title: Garrison of Osgiliath (6C52)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Fortification. Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a [Gondor] Man to place 2 [Gondor] tokens here. Skirmish: Discard this condition or remove a [Gondor] token from here to make a [Gondor] Man strength +1.
Lore:	”'So ever do we watch the shores nigh Osgiliath….'”
Rarity:	C
